complete.check_status_comment: You can check the status right now by clicking the link.
complete.tx_broadcast_network: After 12 confirmations of Ethereum network and 2/3 + 1 confirmations from witnesses, ${amount} ${token} will be minted and sent to your IoTeX address:
complete.tx_broadcast_network.xrc20: After 1 confirmation of IoTeX network and 2/3 + 1 confirmations from witnesses, your XRC20 token will be burnt and ${tokenName} will be sent to your ETH wallet:
contract.install: Please use ioPay desktop, import & unlock your wallet, and then refresh this page to continue.
beta_notice: THIS PRODUCT IS IN BETA. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
may_delay_comment: * may delay due to ETH network congestion.
warning.eth.comment: To convert from ERC20 to XRC20, please open in a supported browser (Firefox/Chrome/Brave) with metamask installed.
warning.iotx.comment.mobile: To convert from XRC20 to ERC20, please open inside ioPay Android/iOS for mobile users.
